briefTitle: Study of the Effect of Chondroitin Sulfate on Structural Changes in Knee Osteoarthritis Patients Assessed by MRI
officialTitle: Twenty-four Month Exploratory Study of the Effect of Chondroitin Sulphate on Structural Changes in Knee Osteoarthritis Patients as Assessed by MRI
summary: The main purpose of this study is to compare the cartilage volume loss at the Baseline visit and after 24 months of treatment in patients treated with CHONDROITIN SULPHATE (CONDROSAN) 1200 mg daily vs. patients treated with CELECOXIB 200 mg daily.

primaryOutcome.measure: Cartilage Volume Loss of the Lateral Compartment
